desc: Cedrics Somerset home of the original Somerset cider and apple cake. taste of the west champion beekeepers marmalade and hot sweet pickle relish. Gold award winning cakes, jam, chutney, jelly, marmalade and cider. Local cheese. Somerset cider brandy, Rum, Whiskey, Gin. Collection. Mail order. Hampers. Birthdays

layout.text: Home of the Original Somerset Cider and Apple Cake.
